statement: There exist a real Banach space #T_arbit_banach_space ( #T_arbit_banach_space_set, #T_arbit_banach_space_norm ) and a #T_group_homomorphism $\phi : G \to \mathbb{B}$ such that $\ell{x} = \| \phi(x) \|$ for all $x \in G$. Furthermore, if $\ell$ is a #T_length_function, one can take #T_arbit_homomorphism to be injective, i.e., an isometric embedding.
